data.title: c. 1830 · Pictura Antique Prints
data.meta_description: 'HUGO FOSCOLO.' - Original antique print showing a portrait of Ugo Foscolo (1778 - 1827), born Niccolo Foscolo, an Italian writer, revolutionary and a poet.
data.text:
Description

Original antique print showing a portrait of Ugo Foscolo (1778 – 1827), born Niccolo Foscolo, an Italian writer, revolutionary and a poet.

Made by after an anonymous artist.

Medium: Engraving / etching on wove paper.

Sheet size: 15.8 x 24 cm (6.22 x 9.45 inch). Image size: 7.1 x 14.5 cm. (2.8 x 5.71 inch).

Condition: good, given age. A few minor spots. General age-related toning and/or occasional minor defects from handling. Please study scan carefully.

UGO FOSCOLO-ITALIAN POET-PORTRAIT | PCO-A17-21

BACKGROUND INFORMATION

Published in Germany c. 1830.

Biography engraver: Martin Esslinger (1793-1841), German engraver.
